entries.title: YaaiiA
entries.desc: Short for "Yet another alien invasion in Atlanta", this was an entry for the Dreamhack Atlanta 18 game jam that I collaborated on, developed in Unity.

entries.title: Twilight Punkster Galaxy
entries.desc: Started work on the MMORPG "Twilight Punkster Galaxy" as a fullstack developer, working with Express and Vue.js.

entries.title: Stardust
entries.desc: Briefly worked with Stardust's blockchain technologies in Electron before immediately moving to TPG.

entries.title: Corgi Stack 3D
entries.desc: Sequel to my entry for the 2016 Corgsmas game jam, Corgi Stack 3D is a reimagined puzzle-platformer comprised of various breeds and sizes of dogs acting as moving platforms.

entries.title: Mere Mercy
entries.desc: A collaborative project for an Android Zombie Shooter game, built in Unity.

entries.title: Cherry
entries.desc: Chatbot build in Node.js with Discord.js, it is capable of playing music with the help of youtube-dl.

entries.title: Untitled Worm I/O
entries.desc: A shortlived Slither.io inspired project, utilizing cryptocurrency as a driving mechanic.

entries.title: Shh - Encrypted Chat
entries.desc: Peer to peer encrypted chat client built in Electron with WebRTC and WebSockets. Encryption was done with AES and RSA.

entries.title: Sandbox
entries.desc: Work in progress JavaScript Sandbox. It uses WebRTC and Socket.io for player communication, and is built in Electron.

entries.title: Bearmon
entries.desc: An online multiplayer bear turn based RPG for the 2017 Bear Week jam on Game Jolt

entries.title: Unnamed Isoline Map
entries.desc: An isoline generator built in jQuery, it uses Leaflet maps.
